entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 17. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. Clearing overnight. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Thursday 23 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Mainly sunny. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 22 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Thursday 23 March 2023
